thread.title: 'Malare...' popular in election campaign too
thread.title_full: 'Malare...' popular in election campaign too - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: 'Malare...' popular in election campaign too
text:
As the state gears up for Local Assembly Elections, the most parodied movie song of Malayalam is Malare... from Alphonse Putheran's Premam film.
It seems every candidate prefers this song as their lead song while campaigning. Hence, all the makers have to do is replace the candidate's name and party name and make some necessary changes.
